title: Oncoming Storm Beekeeper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee to prepare a Strike on a player. Strikes will activate the following morning.
- Use 2 bees to set a Striked player's defense to Vulnerable for the night.
- Use 3 bees to redirect all non-Thundercry Striked players to a player of your choice tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will earn 1 bee every night. You can use 2 abilities per night.
- Whenever a player is Striked, you gain 0.25 bees.
- If two or more Striked players are alive, you gain Basic defense.

desc:
Post 2829
*The splitting bzzzz of a bee's call rings senselessly through the air.*
